short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple todo list with a minimalistic UI that lets you keep track of your pending tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly track your tasks with our minimalist to-do list extension. Just jot down your tasks and check them off as you go!

Features:
1. Drag-and-Drop Reordering: Easily rearrange your tasks in any order with simple drag-and-drop functionality.
2. Clean, Intuitive UI: Enjoy a minimalistic and user-friendly interface that makes task management effortless.
3. Two themes i.e. Dark and Light to choose from!
4. Flexible Task Entries: Add any type of taskâ€”no restrictions, just jot down what you need to do.
5. Seamless Task Completion: Check off tasks as you complete them and stay organized with ease.

Version 1.2.2:
- Bugs fixed

Version 1.2.1:
- Task-writing is more flexible. 
- Dark theme added
- Task reordering added
- UI improved

Version 1.1.1:
- Badge related bug fixed
- Window sizing improved 

Version 1.1.0:
- Added badges for displaying task count 
- Performance Increased
- Tasks will be ordered as per time
- Permissions reduced
